mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.user_id, u.passwd, u.name, u.salt, tm.team_id, tm.role FROM user u LEFT JOIN team_membership tm ON u.id = tm.user_fk where u.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT u.id, u.user_id, u.passwd, u.name, u.position, u.height, u.stamina, u.age, u.main_foot, tm.role FROM user u left join team_membership tm on u.id = tm.user_fk where tm.team_id = #{teamId} order by (tm.role = '팀장') desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_id, name, passwd, email, salt) VALUES (#{userId}, #{name}, #{passwd}, #{email}, #{salt})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET position = #{position}, stamina = #{stamina}, age = #{age}, main_foot = #{mainFoot}, height = #{height} WHERE id = #{id}
